bug1_product_images: Product images display correctly in admin panel
Product image URLs are full Cloudinary URLs (not prepended with backend URL)
bug2_category_aspect_ratio: Category images use aspect-square (1:1) in CatalogPage.js

bug3_promo_image_swap: Promo banner API supports left_image and right_image fields
API accepts and saves swapped image positions

bug4_bonus_button_text: request_button_text field returns 'Получить приз' from API

bug5_order_customer_info: Order details modal shows full_name correctly
Order details modal shows phone correctly

API returns full_name, phone, address, comment in orders
